The broadleaf-external jar contains redistributions of the following libraries:

1) GWT-SL (http://gwt-widget.sourceforge.net/)
2) GWT-JAVA-MATH (http://code.google.com/p/gwt-java-math/)

the broadleaf-external jar contains redistributions and modifications of the following libraries:

1) GWT-INCUBATOR-SECURITY (http://code.google.com/p/gwt-incubator-lib/)
